name: Applied Energy-Flow Cosmology v2.2 – Cross-Field Integration Summary (2025)
description:
This research note summarizes the applied layer of Energy-Flow Cosmology (EFC), a thermodynamic framework linking cosmology, biology, artificial intelligence, and economics.

EFC treats energy flow and entropy as universal variables governing the emergence and stability of complex systems. The framework integrates non-equilibrium thermodynamics (Prigogine, Haken), energy-rate density (Chaisson), and informational adaptation (Friston) into a cross-field analytic model.
